query:
SELECT e.id,
            e.display_name,
            e.category_id,
            e.created_at,
                COALESCE(
                    (SELECT array_agg(t.tag_id) FROM entity_tags t WHERE t.entity_id = e.id), 
                    array[]::uuid[]
                ) as "tags!"
            FROM entities e
            INNER JOIN entities_entities ee ON e.id = ee.child_id
            WHERE ee.parent_id = $1
